argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dchrmhm.g | |- G = ( DChr ` N ) |
| 2 |  | dchrmhm.z | |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) |
| 3 |  | dchrmhm.b | |- D = ( Base ` G ) |
| 4 |  | dchrmul.t | |- .x. = ( +g ` G ) |
| 5 |  | dchrmul.x | |- ( ph -> X e. D ) |
| 6 |  | dchrmul.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. D ) |
| 7 | 1, 3 | #P_dchrrcl | |- ( X e. D -> N e. NN ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 8 | #P_dchrplusg | |- ( ph -> .x. = ( oF x. |` ( D X. D ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ph -> ( X .x. Y ) = ( X ( oF x. |` ( D X. D ) ) Y ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 6 | #P_ofmresval | |- ( ph -> ( X ( oF x. |` ( D X. D ) ) Y ) = ( X oF x. Y ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( X .x. Y ) = ( X oF x. Y ) ) |
